articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Five people were killed and 46 injured in a Ukrainian attack on the southwestern Russian city of Belgorod late on Friday, the local governor said, the latest in a series of strikes by Ukraine on the city in recent months.
articles.title: Russia says five killed, 46 injured in Ukraine strike on Belgorod

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: A Mexican judge ordered the Lower House of Congress not to discuss a controversial judicial reform scheduled to be taken up by lawmakers the first week of September, according to a legal document reviewed by Reuters on Saturday.
articles.title: Mexico judge orders congress not to discuss controversial judicial reform - legal document

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Agreements for up to 12 million doses through next year are possible.
articles.title: UNICEF issues emergency tender to secure mpox vaccines

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: At least six people were dead as Typhoon Shanshan crept eastward through Japan on Saturday, drenching large areas with torrential rain, triggering landslide and flood warnings hundreds of kilometres from the storm's centre.
articles.title: At least 6 dead in Japan as Typhoon Shanshan grinds on

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine launched an overnight drone attack targeting Moscow and several other Russian regions on Sunday, Russian officials said.
articles.title: Ukraine launches drones on Moscow, other regions, Russian officials say
